channel.title: Shop Help [PI]
channel.description:
I've just downloaded a day or two ago, an economy server, with much to offer. I have decided to turn it into a pk server, and I got a lot of stuff going good, but I am not good with shops. I am trying to turn the shop 'Bob' into a shop that has barrows items in it to sell. Could someone help me with this? I have teamviewer. I noticed in the shopassistant class how it worked, i think, but i need further help.
Possibly teamviewer? Thanks.

item.title: Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RuneForge_RSPS RuneForge RSPS
item.description:
@RuneForge_RSPS wrote:

:D, thanks again, lolz. Love your username.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RuneForge RSPS:

Ha, you guys are too much. Thanks guys for the help, I didn’t realize how simple that was, LOL!

You’re quite welcome.

item.title: Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

shops.cfg.

I’m going to have to restrain you if you keep helping so much.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

shops.cfg to modify the items in the shop. ActionHandler.java to make the shop open when clicking an npc or object. Npc ex:
Under

Add something similar to this (Change npc id and shop id):

case 155: c.getShops().openShop(5); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RuneForge_RSPS RuneForge RSPS
item.description:
@RuneForge_RSPS wrote:

Oh, really? It’s in the configs? Interesting, I’ll check.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I’d help you, but you want people to teamview you. I’ll still help you I suppose. Look in your Shops Configuration file if you have one. Then you need to search for your “First Click NPC Packet”, or something similar. I believe It’s labeled as: Case 155

Read full topic
